created_at.name: created_at
created_at.comment: Block creation timestamp specified in block header

timestamp_date.name: timestamp_date
timestamp_date.comment: Block creation date specified in block header

size.name: size
size.comment: The size of block data in bytes

stripped_size.name: stripped_size
stripped_size.comment: The size of block data in bytes excluding witness data

weight.name: weight
weight.comment: Three times the base size plus the total size. https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0141.mediawiki

version.name: version
version.comment: Protocol version specified in block header

merkle_root.name: merkle_root
merkle_root.comment: The root node of a Merkle tree, where leaves are transaction hashes

nonce.name: nonce
nonce.comment: Difficulty solution specified in block header

bits.name: bits
bits.comment: Difficulty threshold specified in block header

coinbase_param.name: coinbase_param
coinbase_param.comment: Data specified in the coinbase transaction of this block

transaction_count.name: transaction_count
transaction_count.comment: Number of transactions included in this block

metadata.name: int_customers
metadata.comment: This table has basic information about a customer, as well as some derived facts based on a customer's orders

customer_id.name: customer_id
customer_id.comment: This is a unique identifier for a customer

first_order.name: first_order
first_order.comment: Date (UTC) of a customer's first order

most_recent_order.name: most_recent_order
most_recent_order.comment: Date (UTC) of a customer's most recent order

number_of_orders.name: number_of_orders
number_of_orders.comment: Count of the number of orders a customer has placed

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: int_orders
metadata.comment:
This table has basic information about orders, as well as some derived facts based on payments
For column descriptions please check dbt docs as the description exceeds BigQuery's max allowed characters.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: blocks
metadata.comment:
All blocks.
Data is exported using https://github.com/blockchain-etl/bitcoin-etl
